argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cphipcj.h | |- ., = ( .i ` W ) |
| 2 |  | cphipcj.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 3 |  | cphdir.P | |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cphphl | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> W e. PreHil ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) = ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 1, 2, 3, 6 | #P_ipdi | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( A ., ( B .+ C ) ) = ( ( A ., B ) ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ( A ., C ) ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( A ., ( B .+ C ) ) = ( ( A ., B ) ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ( A ., C ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_cphclm | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> W e. CMod ) |
| 10 | 5 | #P_clmadd | |- ( W e. CMod -> + = ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> + = ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> + = ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( ( A ., B ) + ( A ., C ) ) = ( ( A ., B ) ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ( A ., C ) ) ) |
| 14 | 8, 13 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( A ., ( B .+ C ) ) = ( ( A ., B ) + ( A ., C ) ) ) |
